Package entity

Class SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn

java.lang.Object
entity.SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn
Enclosing class:
SnakeEntity
private static class SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn
extends java.lang.Object
An inner class used to encapsulate a turn which needs to be made by the snake

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) SnakeEntity.DIRECTION newDirection
    The direction that the turn needs to make the snake turn
    protected boolean toDestroy
    Represents whether or not the turn has been completed by every SnakePart

    The X position of the turn
    (package private) int y
